title: Conversation mode follow-up without wake word
description: Verify Dave can ask follow-up questions immediately after BMO responds without repeating the wake word

steps.action: Complete a normal voice interaction ('Hey BMO, what's on my calendar?')
steps.expected: BMO responds with audio through speakers

steps.action: Immediately after BMO finishes speaking, say 'and what about tomorrow?' (no wake word)
steps.expected: Client is still in listening mode, captures the follow-up audio
Follow-up sent to daemon and processed as normal voice query. BMO responds with tomorrow's calendar

steps.action: Stay silent after BMO's second response for 4+ seconds
steps.expected: Client exits conversation mode, returns to idle wake-word-only listening

steps.action: Try saying a question without the wake word (while in idle mode)
steps.expected: No response — client only responds to wake word in idle mode

result: PARTIAL — code verified. (1) _voice_interaction_loop supports follow-up: after playback, listens for follow_up_duration (3s default) for speech. (2) If speech detected, processes as new query without wake word. (3) If silence, returns to idle. (4) One level of follow-up per wake word cycle. Full test needs laptop with mic/speakers.
